A complete but simple main program

 
#include <MBA.h>
#include <MBAutils.h>

int main() {

  // Read scattered data from the file Data/rygg1.dat.
  // The format is assumed to be:
  // x y z
  // x y z
  // x y z
  // etc.
  std::vector<double> x_arr,y_arr,z_arr;
  MBAutils::readScatteredData("Data/rygg1.dat", x_arr, y_arr, z_arr);

  MBA mba(x_arr, y_arr, z_arr);  // Initialize with scattered data.
  mba.setBaseType(MBA_CONSTLS);  // Recommended base surface.
  mba.MBAalg(1,1,7);             // Create spline surface.

  double x = 5.0, y = 5.0;
  double z = mba.f(x,y);         // Find height of surface in (x,y).
  double nx,ny,nz;
  mba.gradf(x,y, nx,ny,nz);      // Find normal vector of surface in (x,y).

  cout << "z-value in (5,5) = " << z << endl;
  cout << "Normal in (5,5) = (" << nx << "," << ny << "," << nz << ")" << endl;  

  // Sample surface and print to VRML file.
  MBAutils::printVRMLgrid(mba, 50, 50, "qwe.wrl", true);  

  return 0;
}
